snippet.title: Battleship | Official Game Trailer | Netflix
snippet.description:
Sink or be sunk! Deploy smart tactics and a powerful arsenal to bring down your opponent's hidden fleet in this classic guessing game.

Play Battleship on your mobile devices. Available exclusively on Netflix: https://www.netflix.com/game/81702170

About Netflix:
Netflix is one of the world's leading entertainment services, with 278 million paid memberships in over 190 countries enjoying TV series, films and games across a wide variety of genres and languages. Members can play, pause and resume watching as much as they want, anytime, anywhere, and can change their plans at any time.

Battleship | Official Game Trailer | Netflix
https://www.youtube.com/@Netflix

Sink or be sunk! Deploy smart tactics and a powerful arsenal to bring down your opponent's hidden fleet in this classic guessing game.
